lines.text: You know what I think? I think the Go Wizard here is just like the Stop Wizard.
He ain't breathin', there's a hole in his chest, and there's blood everywhere.
You really want to try and explain all that without sayin' he's dead?
I think I do want to do that, Leo.
No, really. Like, the blood all over the place?
Who's to say it's <c=#FF00FF>his</c> blood? They've got a half-empty bottle of the stuff sitting right there, don't they?
Wha... half-empty? The extra-virgin virgin's blood?
Or half-full. Depends on your perspective.
But yeah! That puddle of blood is store-bought, not homemade!
But there's still a dang <c=#FF00FF>hole</c> in his chest, and he <c=#FF00FF>ain't breathin'.</c>
You got a clever explanation for that, too?
Uh... hm. I don't think that's too hard to figure out, either...
Yeah, I'll believe it when I see it.
